Uses of Interface
com.stormpath.sdk.account.AccountList

  • Packages that use AccountList 
    Package Description
    com.stormpath.sdk.application  
    com.stormpath.sdk.directory

    • Uses of AccountList in com.stormpath.sdk.application

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.application that return AccountList 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountList Application.getAccounts()
      Returns a paginated list of all accounts that may login to the application.
      AccountList Application.getAccounts(AccountCriteria criteria)
      Returns a paginated list of the accounts that may login to the application that also match the specified query criteria.
      AccountList Application.getAccounts(Map<String,Object> queryParams)
      Returns a paginated list of the accounts that may login to the application that also match the specified query criteria.

    • Uses of AccountList in com.stormpath.sdk.directory

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountList Directory.getAccounts()
      Returns a paginated list of all accounts in the Directory.
      AccountList Directory.getAccounts(AccountCriteria criteria)
      Returns a paginated list of the directory's accounts that match the specified query criteria.
      AccountList Directory.getAccounts(Map<String,Object> queryParams)
      Returns a paginated list of the directory's accounts that match the specified query criteria.

    • Uses of AccountList in com.stormpath.sdk.group

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.group that return AccountList 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountList Group.getAccounts()
      Returns a paginated list of all accounts in the group.

    • Uses of AccountList in com.stormpath.sdk.tenant

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.tenant that return AccountList 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountList TenantActions.getAccounts()
      Returns a paginated list of all of the current tenant's Account instances.
      AccountList TenantActions.getAccounts(AccountCriteria criteria)

      Returns a paginated list of the current tenant's accounts that match the specified query criteria.
